title: 1 BED Available June Move In Special 300.00 off!!
posting_body: ['JUNE MOVE IN SPECIAL!!!', '$300.00 OFF MOVE IN FEE ..UNTIL 30TH', 'Rockside Place Apartments', 'CALL US:', 'show contact info', 'Copy & Paste the Link', 'Below to Send Us an Email through our Website:', '<URL>', 'Rockside Place Apartments in Garfield Heights offers affordable apartment living with great community amenities.', 'All throughout Rockside Place Apartments, residents will find fantastic services that include twenty-four-hour maintenance, on-site management, convenient laundry on-site, ample parking, and additional storage spaces.', 'Rockside Place Apartments also has a great selection of one-, two and three-bedroom apartment homes for rent.', 'These homes come with individual climate controls, mini blinds, washer and dryers in every building, linen closets, and air conditioning.', 'Rockside Place Apartments is in a quiet neighborhood and is within proximity to popular Garfield shopping plaza and dining establishments.', 'If you are ready to live in this beautiful community, stop by Rockside Place Apartments Today!!!!!!!', 'Floor Plan Options', '•\t1 Bed 1 Bath starting from $690.00', '•\t2 Bed 1 Bath starting from $750.00', '•\t2 Bed 2 Bath starting from $850.00', 'Property Amenities', '•\tNear Public Transit', '•\tOnsite Laundry', '•\t24/7 Emergency Maintenance', '•\tShopping Plaza', 'Lease Terms:', '12 month', 'Pet Policy:', 'Cats and Dogs are allowed.', 'Pet friendly.', 'Call for details.', 'Office Hours', '•\tMonday – Thursday: 9am – 6pm', '•\tFriday: 9:00am – 5:00pm', '•\tSaturday: Closed', '•\tSunday: open the first Sunday of every month', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'Rockside Place Apartments', '12205 Valley Lane Drive', 'Garfield Heights, Ohio ,44125', 'PROPERTY WEBSITE:', '<URL>', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY']
